aboutSection.title: About BTB Global Trading
aboutSection.body: BTB Global Trading is your trusted partner in navigating the complexities of international trade and finance. Headquartered in Warsaw, our team supports businesses worldwide with tailored solutions designed to enable efficient, secure, and compliance-aligned cross-border operations. Transactions are carried out by licensed financial partners.

hero.title: Comprehensive Solutions for Your Global Business
hero.subtitle: At BTB Global Trading, we support international operators and private clients with execution-focused services designed to streamline cross-border payments, optimize FX coordination, and reduce friction across global trade workflows.

globalPayments.title: Global Payments
globalPayments.body: Cross-border settlements coordinated through regulated channels. We support multi-currency payments across key corridors in Europe, Latin America, the Middle East, and Asia through licensed financial partners.
bullets: Multi-currency settlements across major and emerging corridors.
Supplier and operational payments with tracking and documentation readiness.
Same-day / next-day execution in many corridors (subject to onboarding and cut-offs).
Payment structuring aligned to regulated processes and operational realities.

fxTreasury.title: FX & Treasury Services
fxTreasury.body: Better currency execution, timing, and control across jurisdictions. We support finance teams with structured FX coordination and treasury planning via partner solutions where appropriate.
bullets: FX conversion coordination with clear visibility into execution structure.
Hedging support through partner solutions (where available and appropriate).
Treasury timing and cash flow planning across currencies and pay dates.
Deal-specific structuring (split payments, staged settlements, multi-party flows).

tradeSupport.title: Trade Support
tradeSupport.body: Operational support for international trade workflows. We help teams reduce friction in payments, documentation readiness, and cross-border coordination across regions and counterparties.
bullets: Execution support for trade-related payment workflows across jurisdictions.
Support for compliance-aligned processes and partner onboarding readiness.
Coordination across time zones, currencies, and operational constraints.
Regional experience across Europe, Latin America, the Middle East, and China.

hero.title: BTB Global Trading
hero.subtitle: Your Trusted Partner in International Trade and Payments
hero.body1: BTB Global Trading supports international trade finance coordination and cross-border payment operations, headquartered in Warsaw, Poland. Our mission is to simplify complex global workflows and help businesses execute efficiently across markets.
hero.body2: With a deep understanding of global corridors and regulatory environments, our team supports importers, exporters, and international operators with tailored coordination and execution support through licensed partners.
hero.body3: We prioritize long-term relationships built on clarity and trust. At BTB Global Trading, seamless cross-border payments and operational trade support are core to enabling global business.
